sources.title: The Other Love (1947)
sources.description: Concert pianist Karen Duncan checks into a Swiss sanatorium, unaware her illness is terminal. Torn between thrill-seeking racer Paul and her cold, dedicated doctor Tony, she chooses passion over caution—until tragedy strikes. As her health declines, she must decide between fleeting pleasures or a love that could save her life. A romantic drama where time, love, and fate collide. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-other-love-1947/
